Search. This service allows you to set up your compatible Telstra mobile phone for BigPond Mobile Services, Picture and Video Messaging (MMS), e-mail on your phone and much, much more. To set up your mobile phone quickly and easily, click Set up.

Transcript: To set up your BigPond. email account, you'll firstly need to confirm. your customer details. If you're not sure what they are, follow this link and it'll. take you to our webmail site. Here, enter either your BigPond. or Telstra username and password.
To set up your email. on the BigPond mailbox service, go to Apps, Settings, then tap Accounts. Now Add Account, and select Email. Enter your email address. and password. and then press Manual Setup.
